cancel.title: We are waiting for your deployment request
cancel.subTitle: After that, you will be redirected to the asset issue page

req.title: Request to deploy a new stablecoin “{{feed_name}} on {{expiry_date}}”

res.title: New stablecoin “{{feed_name}} on {{expiry_date}}” deployed. Its address is {{address}}.

req.title: Request to record the exchange rate on the expiration date

res.title: Exchange rate on the expiration date was recorded

req.title: Request for repayment of the loan by {{address}}

auctionPeriod.name: Auction period (seconds)
auctionPeriod.descr: When a loan becomes undercollateralized, it is put up on auction and is sold to the highest bidder. If a bid is not outbid by another bidder during the auction period, the auction ends and the loan is transferred to the winner.

liquidationRatio.name: liquidation ratio
liquidationRatio.descr: If the collateralization ratio of a loan drops below this value, the loan will be auctioned and sold to the highest bidder.

overCollateralizationRatio.name: Overcollateralization ratio
overCollateralizationRatio.descr: Amount of collateral required to issue stablecoins relative to the value of stablecoins. For example, if the value of collateral must be 150% the value of stablecoins to be issued, overcollateralization ratio is 1.5.

oracle.name: Oracle
oracle.descr: Address of price oracle that tracks the exchange rate between the target currency (e.g. USD) and the collateral currency (e.g. GBYTE).

feedName.name: Feed name
feedName.descr: Name of the data feed where the oracle posts the exchange rate.

decimals.name: Decimals
decimals.descr: Number of decimals used to represent the stablecoin amounts. This number determines the precision of all calculations with the stablecoins. Internally, stablecoin amounts are always represented as integer numbers that are 10^decimals times bigger than displayed amounts.

maFeedName.name: Moving average feed name
maFeedName.descr: Name of the data feed where the oracle posts a moving average of the exchange rate. Moving average is designed to smooth the volatility of the instantaneous exchange rate and prevent premature liquidations.

maxLoan.name: Max loan value
maxLoan.descr: Maximum number of stablecoins that can be borrowed in a single loan. If it is too large, there could be no or few participants who are able to buy the loan from auction should the loan become undercollateralized. Large borrowers can still take several loans.

expiryDate.name: Expiry date
expiryDate.descr: Date when the stablecoin becomes exchangeable for the collateral currency at exchange rate registered on that date. After that date, no more loans will be issued.

expired.description: After the expiration date, you need to send a request to record the current rate

error.maxChar: The maximum number of characters is {{count}}

pending.title: Stablecoin AA created, now please define its asset
